title: Shut up (feat. Big Murph)
lyrics:
You will say, all the time, what you think about
And I stand, and I nod, and I wait around
I'm gonna pull myself together and simplify some things
And shut up

You overwork, all the time, and you're tired again

And I stand, and I nod, and I sigh and stretch

I'm gonna try and get a hair cut, a shampoo, and a shave

And shut up



I'm not here, I'm a drunk, and I'm on my own

You get up, put on your shoes, and you go on home

I'm gonna watch you walk outside now, and make a stupid face

And shut up
